name: Tower Unite
description: PLAY, CREATE, PARTY! Tower Unite is a community-based virtual world party game with online games, entertainment, activities, and absolutely NO microtransactions.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX10 Compatible GPU with 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 25 GB available space Additional Notes: Integrated graphic cards will have trouble running the game.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 26 GB available space
